author: jdillon
msg: Hook up the new and improved plexus-maven-plugin which can now handle javadoc tags as well as java5 annotations to generate components.xml (yay)

author: woonsan
msg: My implementation had two options: (1) [default] based on constraints/permissions, (2) [optional]
However, IMO, the option (2) is not necessary because it is supported by the option (1).
Also, to have the option (2) seems making things complicated.
So, I removed the option (2) and reverted the xml files and DecorationValve.
